Pre-Game Insights: The game between the Los Angeles Lakers and Cleveland Cavaliers is scheduled for October 30, 2024. Both teams have had strong starts to the season, with the Lakers at 3-1 and the Cavaliers undefeated at 4-0. The Cavaliers are currently 4.5-point favorites as of October 30, 2024.
Others: FanDuel Sportsbook is offering a special promotion for the game, providing two 50% Profit Boost Tokens for NBA games taking place on October 30, 2024. One token can be used for a 3+ leg Same Game Parlay / Same Game Parlay Plus wager, and the other can be used for a 2+ leg 'To Record a Double-Double' SGP/SGP+/Parlay wager.
